name: After You (Mark Emanuele)
description:
Objective:

While trying to reach the end of each level, you must rely on your past attempts to make it all the way through. 

Controls:
- A & D:                   Move Left and Right
- Space Bar:         Jump
- J:                             Spawn Platform (Limit: 3)
- K:                            Remove Most Recent Platform
- L:                             Reset Player
- ESC:                      Pause

I hope you enjoy what I have made! Feel free to leave comments or feedback for me!
